Return a human-\/readable representation of statistics. 

The string is truncated if it does not fit. 100 characters should be sufficient space.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em stats} & Statistics from an encoding or decoding operation.\\
\hline
{\em buf} & Buffer to receive result. \\
\hline
{\em size} & Size of buffer. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
buf 
\end{DoxyReturn}
